column1: melonie  glad I found your content via chrissie mayr.  your commentary on various topics and your willingness to share your faith make your content very appealing!  we all have our own ways of being ambassadors for Christ.

youre right on about the God granting people their selfless desires  not their selfish desires. the first thing I read in the Bible was james  which promises if you genuinely ask for and seek wisdom  the God will grant liberally
I want a melonie mac shaker  I dont care whats on it.
